derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 19th cent.: from modern Latin Pterosauria (plural), from Greek pteron 'wing' + sauros 'lizard'

means.word_mean: 1. extinct flying reptile of the Jurassic and Cretaceous having a birdlike beak and membranous wings supported by the very long fourth digit of each forelimb
